alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 05 at 6:56PM MST until November 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow...moderate to heavy at times...and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. A rain snow mix will change to all snow between 9 and 10 pm this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
